recipe.title: Strawberry Coconut Pineapple Shake
ingredients: 8 ounces strawberries, hulled and sliced (about 1 cup)
1/2 cup well-stirred canned cream of coconut
instructions: In a blender, blend the strawberries, the cream of coconut, the frozen yogurt, and the pineapple juice until the mixture is smooth and pour the mixture into chilled glasses.
